name: Online Media Group, Inc.
description: Operator of a competitive intelligence research platform intended to identify effective advertisements and traffic sources. The company's platform collects and analyzes vast amounts of data across the internet to learn everything about possible buyers, company firmographics, decision-makers, websites, applications, commercial technologies, and advertising campaigns, enabling companies to narrow down and qualify their target prospects, plan market strategies and retain customers.
